sentence.Network_en: Carya cathayensis has unisexual flowers born on the same tree.
sentence.Network_cn: 山核桃为单性花,雌雄同株.

sentence.Network_en: Traditional management of Carya cathayensis is semi - wild extensive management , one tending only in on - year before seeding.
sentence.Network_cn: 传统山核桃林分为半野生状态的粗放经营, 仅在结实大年采果前林地劈山抚育1次.

sentence.Network_en: Presently the low and unsteady yield is a main problem existing in Carya cathayensis prodution.
sentence.Network_cn: 目前山核桃(Caryacathayensis Sarg.)生产中,存在的主要问题是产量不稳不高.
